mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS amount, c.name FROM bid b JOIN item_tag i ON b.item_id = i.item_id JOIN category c ON i.tag_id = c.id WHERE MONTH(bid_time) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) - 1 GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT alias,sum(highest_bid) as amount FROM item i JOIN ums_user u ON u.id = i.winner_id GROUP BY i.winner_id ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT alias, count(*) as amount FROM item i JOIN ums_user u ON u.id=i.donor_id GROUP BY donor_id ORDER BY amount desc;
SELECT MONTH(end_time) AS month, SUM(highest_bid) AS amount FROM item WHERE YEAR(end_time) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) AND end_time < CURRENT_DATE() GROUP BY MONTH(end_time) ORDER BY month;

SELECT t.id,t.title,t.donor_id,t.comments,t.pay_link,t.is_pay, t.view,t.collects,t.top,t.essence,t.is_end, t.bid_count, t.create_time ,t.modify_time ,t.end_time,t.highest_bid,t.address, t.is_notify,t.winner_id,t.cover, u.username,u.alias, u.avatar FROM item t LEFT JOIN ums_user u ON t.donor_id = u.id
date(t.create_time) <= date_add(curdate(), interval 1 day) and date(t.create_time) >= date_sub(curdate(), interval 7 day)
order by t.create_time desc
order by t.view desc, t.create_time desc
select * from item t where t.id != #{id} order by rand(), t.view limit 10

SELECT b.amount AS maxAmount, b.item_id as itemId, b.user_id as userId FROM bid b JOIN ( SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, item_id FROM bid GROUP BY item_id ) max_bid ON b.item_id = max_bid.item_id AND b.amount = max_bid.max_amount WHERE b.item_id = #{id} ORDER BY b.bid_time ASC -- Order by bid_time in ascending order LIMIT 1; -- Limit the result to one row;
